content: creative beauty is a projection of the heart spring starlight sandals size - 0-3 months 3 5 long x 2 wide at toe approx 4 around ankle strap - 3-6 months 3 75 long x 2 wide at toe approx 4 5 around ankle strap pg 8-12 - 6-9 months 4 25 long x 2 25 wide at toe approx 5 around ankle strap pg 13-15 - 9-12 months 4 5 long x 2 25 wide at toe approx 5 5 around ankle strap pg 16-18 materials - 3 5mm hook - 5ply yarn in two contrasting colours scheepjes stonewashed is recommended - yarn needle - scissors - 2 x decorative buttons stitch terms and abbreviations us terms - chain chain - st/sts stitch/stitches - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - foundation double_crochet fdc this is used for the ankle strap of the sandal there are many videos available online to help with this stitch i have provided some photos as well - star stitch this stitch is used to create the strap and heel feature i strongly suggest watching a video clip to help if the photo tutorial is still confusing 😊 this is a tricky stitch to get started inspired by the beauty of my favourite season these spring starlight sandals are the perfect gift for the loved ones in your life the sandals are made from a 5ply cotton blend yarn but i have tried these in a 4ply acrylic and they work perfectly any yarn will be suitable for this project as long as your final sandal sole meets the measurements on the front page i have provided some photo tutorials for the star stitch strap and also joining the heel and strap these are detailed in the 0-3-month instructions thank you for your support of my designs i can t wait to see your creations remember to tag me in your posts - @emmeclairecrochet if you have any questions about the pattern please contact me at emmeclairecrochet@gmail com or ravelry emmeclaire crochet designs facebook emmeclaire crochet instagram emmeclaire crochet ❤ ❤ happy crochet ❤ ❤ 2 before you start - the soles of the shoes are worked in c ontinuous rounds mark the first stitch in each round and move up with each completed round - the toe strap is made separately and sewn to sole - the heel strap is worked differently for the left and right shoes method 0-3 months sole make four soles two in each colour
